summary_points: 1. S&P Global Inc. and CME Group Inc. sold their joint venture, OSTTRA, to KKR for $3.1 billion on April 14, 2025.
2.  The $3.1 billion sale of OSTTRA will be split evenly between S&P Global and CME Group.
3. The transaction is expected to close in the second half of 2025, subject to customary closing conditions and regulatory approvals.
1. DaVita Inc. experienced a ransomware incident on April 12, 2025, impacting some operations, though patient care continues.
2. The 8-K filing, made on April 14, 2025, reports that the full impact of the ransomware attack on DaVita is currently unknown.
3.  DaVita's investigation and response to the ransomware attack are ongoing, as of April 14, 2025,  preventing an estimation of the duration or extent of operational disruption.
